Key Match Events: The Hornets struggled in the second quarter, missing their first four shots and turning the ball over three times, leading to a 13-2 run by the Cavaliers and a significant lead
Post-Match Reflections: Hornets Head Coach Charles Lee expressed frustration with the slow start and defensive struggles
Nick Smith Jr. scored a season-high 18 points and showed strong performance
Miscellaneous Highlights: Cleveland is now 18-1 on the season
Charlotte has now dropped 10-straight games, including six on the road
